<h3 id="X38122">X(38122) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(7), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-3*(b+c)*a^5+(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a^4+4*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3-3*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38122) = X(3)+2*X(142) = 2*X(3)+X(5805) = 5*X(3)+X(31671) = 2*X(5)+X(5732) = 2*X(5)-5*X(20195) = 4*X(5)-X(31672) = X(7)+5*X(631) = X(7)+2*X(31658) = 4*X(142)-X(5805) = 10*X(142)-X(31671) = X(5732)+5*X(20195) = 2*X(5732)+X(31672) = 5*X(5805)-2*X(31671) = X(5817)+3*X(21151) = 2*X(5817)-3*X(38108) = 2*X(11495)+X(12699) = 10*X(20195)-X(31672) = 2*X(21151)+X(38108) = X(31671)-5*X(38107) = X(38031)+2*X(38123)</b>
<p>X(38122) lies on these lines: {2,971}, {3,142}, {5,5732}, {7,631}, {9,140}, {20,18482}, {30,38093}, {40,20330}, {57,5432}, {144,10303}, {165,38036}, {277,11200}, {355,3826}, {390,11373}, {443,5731}, {495,4321}, {496,4326}, {498,8581}, {499,14100}, {511,38186}, {515,38204}, {517,38053}, {518,10202}, {527,5054}, {528,3653}, {547,38139}, {549,5762}, {942,5657}, {952,9623}, {954,30379}, {990,17245}, {991,17278}, {1385,2550}, {1484,5528}, {2801,38133}, {2951,8227}, {3062,34595}, {3090,36991}, {3243,5690}, {3254,33814}, {3358,6675}, {3523,5759}, {3525,18230}, {3526,5779}, {3530,5735}, {3576,38052}, {3587,28212}, {3616,35514}, {3624,11372}, {3634,5789}, {3824,6865}, {4312,11375}, {4675,13329}, {5122,30275}, {5129,22792}, {5223,31423}, {5433,15299}, {5438,5833}, {5439,37112}, {5542,5708}, {5587,5787}, {5660,11407}, {5709,38041}, {5722,7675}, {5728,6889}, {5770,5791}, {5806,37108}, {5840,38205}, {5845,38117}, {5850,38130}, {5851,38131}, {5852,37612}, {5853,10246}, {5856,38124}, {5857,38125}, {6172,15702}, {6245,10172}, {6259,11108}, {6260,16853}, {6713,10427}, {6826,28160}, {6846,31805}, {6853,10394}, {6885,13624}, {7679,18450}, {7988,8727}, {8127,8389}, {8128,8388}, {8236,24929}, {8703,38137}, {9352,9776}, {9858,19843}, {10164,38054}, {10283,37531}, {10304,38073}, {10383,17726}, {10398,31231}, {10884,17529}, {11230,38037}, {12246,17554}, {12560,37737}, {12618,17265}, {12679,25542}, {13373,15185}, {13727,27147}, {15587,26363}, {15699,38075}, {15803,37701}, {15934,28234}, {16173,30282}, {16845,34862}, {17502,38172}, {17504,38080}, {17668,26492}, {17768,28465}, {18412,24914}, {21154,21164}, {25525,37364}, {25557,37532}, {30284,30312}, {31884,38143}, {38042,38154}</p>
<p>
X(38122) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 21151}, {3, 38107}, {7, 21168}, {165, 38036}, {549, 38111}, {3576, 38052}, {5054, 38065}, {5657, 11038}, {5731, 38149}, {6173, 21153}, {8703, 38137}, {10164, 38054}, {10165, 38123}, {10246, 38121}, {10304, 38073}, {17502, 38172}, {17504, 38080}, {26446, 38030}, {31657, 38113}, {31884, 38143}<br>
X(38122) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (9, 38113), (5805, 38107), (6173, 38111), (21153, 549), (21168, 31658), (38031, 10165), (38037, 11230), (38057, 11231), (38067, 5054), (38075, 15699), (38107, 142), (38108, 2), (38113, 140), (38126, 26446), (38139, 547), (38150, 38171), (38154, 38042), (38158, 10172)<br>
X(38122) = complement of X(5817)<br>
X(38122) = X(5805)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38122) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 142, 5805), (5, 5732, 31672), (7, 631, 31658), (140, 31657, 9), (3525, 36996, 18230), (3526, 5779, 6666), (5732, 20195, 5), (5770, 6989, 11231), (5770, 11231, 5791), (6989, 9940, 5791), (8726, 8728, 5787), (9940, 11231, 5770), (38093, 38150, 38171)<br>
</p>
